sentences.sContent: The rides are unsuitable for people of a nervous disposition.
sentences.sCn: 这种骑乘不适合紧张型性格的人。

sentences.sContent: a map showing the disposition of American forces
Neither side shows the slightest disposition to compromise.
sentences.sCn: 双方都没有表露出丝毫妥协的意思。

synos.tran: 处置；[心理]性情；[军]部署；倾向

words.tran: 可任意处理的；可自由使用的；用完即可丢弃的
有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的
处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向

trans.tranCn: 性格；排列,部署；倾向,意向
trans.tranOther: a particular type of character which makes someone likely to behave or react in a certain way
